price: (Unibuke) umunsi tuzazura umuhamya wa buri muryango (Intumwa yawo); icyo gihe abahakanye ntibazemererwa gutanga impamvu (z’ibyaha bakoze), ndetse nta n’ubwo bazasabwa kwisubiraho (gusubira ku isi ngo bicuze cyangwa ngo basabe imbabazi Allah).
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ نَبۡعَثُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٖ شَهِيدٗا ثُمَّ لَا يُؤۡذَنُ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wayawma nabʿathu min kulli ummatin shahīdan thumma lā yu'dhanu lilladhīna kafarū walā hum yus'taʿtabūna
translations: will be asked to make amends
